name: WorldShatter: Wizards of Ruin
description:
The world was shattered by a magical disaster, and you are lost in an interdimensional void with its remains.

Fortunately, you are not alone: there are more survivors.

Work together to defend yourselves, gather resources, and build a base to endure the onslaught of the void's creatures.

The sound assets were used under CC0 licenses. Some graphic sprites are from third parties, used according to their distribution terms. Certain images were generated by the DALL·E and Stable Diffusion AI systems.
Specifically menu backgrounds current texture and resource crystal sprites were made by DALL·E and the building icons were created by StableDifussion.

The rest of the game was made from scratch in Unity, reusing only a half-finished voxel system  from a previous project and the default unity packages.
Made by Victorlf4 and  AlexTMjugador.
